SENT.plain: We present a rare case of invasive right breast carcinoma in a 72-year-old woman with BehÃ§et's disease (BD)
A radical modified right mastectomy and axillary lymphadenectomy were performed and postoperative hormonal therapy with the aromatase inhibitor anastrozole was administered for adjuvant therapy
At 10 months follow-up the patient remains disease free
Malignancies associated with BD are very uncommon
The pathological findings showed small vessel vasculitis and lobulitis of the breast in association with invasive carcinoma
